caption.p: Percentage of EU and US sites combined in each trend type (e.g., 0, 1a, 1b, etc.) with trends in (a) A4MDA8, (b) 3-month 12-h W126, (c) SOMO35, and (d) 3-month AOT40. Summarized results from Lefohn et al. (2017). Trend Types 5, 6, and 8 did not occur and Trend Type X occurred infrequently. DOI: https://doi.org/10.1525/elementa.279.f9
